definitions: a person who makes very little effort at work because they are waiting to leave or retire

examples.text: giving a man job security turns him into a time-server

shortDefinitions: person who makes very little effort at work because they are waiting to leave or retire

definitions: a person who changes their views to suit the prevailing circumstances or fashion

examples.text: they were replaced with loyal time-servers

shortDefinitions: person who changes their views to suit prevailing circumstances or fashion

definitions: a server that distributes synchronized time information to all members of a network.
shortDefinitions: server that distributes synchronized time information to all members of network
